name: onday
description: Get some historical event on the given date (day / month)
author: frankc60

scripts.test: npm run minifyJS --silent && npm run testcmd
scripts.production: npm run version:bump --silent && rm -f ${npm_package_main} && npm run minifyJS --silent && npm run version:add --silent && npm run testcmd && npm run gitstuff -- "$(npm run version:extract --silent)"
scripts.version:extract: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
